item.title: Day 132, Psalm 65-67, 69-70
item.description: Psalms 65-67 share the common theme of praising God for his goodness and salvation. The strength of God is often depicted using the forces of nature, while the holiness and justice of God are expressed with either praise of God’s salvation or an appeal to God to execute judgement on the wicked.
